net.opentsdb.query.expression

类 ExpressionTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.opentsdb.query.expression.ExpressionTree

  • public class ExpressionTree
extends Object
    A node in a tree of nested expressions. The tree may link to other nodes as sub expressions. Evaluating the tree evaluates all sub expressions.

    Before calling evaluate you MUST call a one or a combination of addSubExpression, addSubMetricQuery and optionally addFunctionParameter

    TODO(cl) - Cleanup needed. Tracking the indices can likely be done better and it would be good to have a ctor that sets the sub or metric query.

    从以下版本开始:
    2.3

    • 构造器详细资料

      • ExpressionTree

        public ExpressionTree(String expression_name,
                      TSQuery data_query)
        Creates a tree with a root and no children
        参数:
        expression_name - The name of the expression to lookup in the factory
        data_query - The original query
        抛出:
        UnsupportedOperationException - if the expression is not implemented

      • ExpressionTree

        public ExpressionTree(Expression expression,
                      TSQuery data_query)
        Creates a tree with a root and no children
        参数:
        expression - The expression to use
        data_query - The original query

    • 方法详细资料

      • addSubExpression

        public void addSubExpression(ExpressionTree child,
                             int param_index)

      • addSubMetricQuery

        public void addSubMetricQuery(String metric_query,
                              int sub_query_index,
                              int param_index)
        Sets the metric query key and index, setting the Parameter type to METRIC_QUERY
        参数:
        metric_query - The metric query id
        sub_query_index - The index of the metric query
        param_index - The index of the parameter (??)

      • addFunctionParameter

        public void addFunctionParameter(String param)
        Adds parameters for the root expression only.
        参数:
        param - The parameter to add, cannot be null or empty
        抛出:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the parameter is null or empty

      • evaluate

        public DataPoints[] evaluate(List<DataPoints[]> query_results)
        Processes the expression tree, including sub expressions, and returns the results. TODO(cl) - More tests around indices, etc. This can likely be cleaned up.
        参数:
        query_results - The result set to pass to the expressions
        返回:
        The result set or an exception will bubble up if something wasn't configured properly.

      • toString

        public String toString()
        覆盖:
        toString 在类中 Object

      • writeStringField

        public String writeStringField()
        Helper to create the original expression (or at least a nested expression without the parameters included)
        返回:
        A string representing the full expression.
